Header: Protecting environment is everyone's responsibility, reminds the President
Content: Sri Lankan President Maithripala Sirisena stated that all parties should get together to fulfill the timely responsibility to protect the environment for the well-being of all living beings. The Head-of-the-State made this remark at the National Program to mark the World Wetland Day, held in Kakkapalliya, Chilaw today. The national program was organized under this yearâ€™s theme: 'Wetlands for our future: sustainable livelihoods'.
